The authors enjoyed writing this book and the immensely warm, welcoming and friendly community of R users that used Twitter frequently. Twitter has undergone significant changes since this book was written, and as of this final book update, was rebranded to X. You may find some of the content in this book interesting for reference or nostalgia. If you want to pick up on where some of the R community have migrated, we suggest you try out Mastodon.
